result.description: Percentage of the time the processor is busy
result.name: PROC_PERCENT_PROCESSOR_TIME

result.description: Amount of memory available for allocation to a process or for system use
result.name: MEM_AVAILABLE_BYTES

result.description: Tracks the number of virtual memory pages read or written per second to or from the virtual memory file.
result.name: MEM_PAGES_PERSEC

result.description: Tracks the average number of items in physical disks queue.
result.name: PDISK_AVG_DISK_QUEUE_LENGTH

result.description: Current read or written rate to or from physical disks.
result.name: PDISK_DISK_BYTES_PERSEC

result.description: Percentage of the time the physical disks are busy servicing read or write requests
result.name: PDISK_PERCENT_DISK_TIME

result.description: FreeSpace is the amount of total free storage space in bytes available on the logical disks
result.name: LDISK_PERCENT_FREE_SPACE

result.description: BytesReceivedPersec are the current transmission rates for the specified network card
result.name: NET_BYTES_RECEIVED_PERSEC

result.description: Tracks the average number of items in the output queue of the specified network card.
result.name: NET_OUTPUT_QUEUE_LENGTH

result.description: BytesSentPersec are the current transmission rates for the specified network card.
result.name: NET_BYTES_SENT_PERSEC

result.description: TCP4ConnectionEstablished,  is the current number of established connections, inbound and outbound
result.name: TCP4_CONNECTIONS_ESTABLISHED

result.description: TCP6ConnectionEstablished,  is the current number of established connections, inbound and outbound
result.name: TCP6_CONNECTIONS_ESTABLISHED
